type.js(4,29): error TS2694: Namespace '"mod1"' has no exported member 'TestEnum'.

value.js(2,12): error TS8010: Type annotations can only be used in TypeScript files.

                                   ~~~~~~~~

    const test = 'add'

    /** @type {TestEnum} */
               ~~~~~~~~

    export const TestEnum = {
